title: [Gameplay] Udyr Spirit Guard Skin bugged stances/VO
body:
No matter which stance you are in, Udyr's taunts and jokes are all stuck to his VO's assigned to his bear stance.

"You'd look better after a good mauling"
"*Grunts* I love hunting...bees."

He says these in all stances, ie his Tiger, Turtle, and Phoenix stance VO's are not accessable. He also does not use any of his VO's for interacting with BAZZA or DAZZA. In a few cases he uses the visual animation for his Tiger Stance Taunt, no matter which stance he is in. I began to notice they bugs around the patch or two before Rek'Sai was announced.

replies.body:
Thanks for the report! We're currently investigating the audio issues. :] 

We'll also take a look at the animation issue you've mentioned as well!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=VZixKI76,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-14T03:08:47.852+0000)
>
> Thanks for the report! We're currently investigating the audio issues. :] 
> 
> We'll also take a look at the animation issue you've mentioned as well!

While you're looking at these ones, there's one more related audio issue. When the game starts at 0:00 Udyr has a voice over line he's supposed to say. The wiki has 3 lines listed. I don't know if they are random or map-specific, but the issue is that he doesn't say anything at all. 25% of the time (on rift) he will say line number 1. 75% of the time he will say nothing.

1) "Hear me, spirits, and rise to my call."
2) "The energy of creation is our strength."
3) "From the four corners ancient guardians wake."

EDIT: Also, I assume "BAZZA AND DAZZA" that the OP is talking about is baron and dragon? Where did those words even come from?
It's what they were called during URF I believe. And yes, baron and dragon.

Much appreciated. I'll try to get some games in as Udyr today and use the skin, I'll try to see if I be anymore specific on the animation issues, and try a few other things out regarding Bazza and Dazza interactions.
Maxing Phoenix stance in a game, while attacking minions in maxed out Turtle stance, I saw both Tiger and Bear spirit animations as well as Turtle stance. Wow.

His dance animation is supposed to trigger the animal spirit of the stance he's in to dance alongside him. Currently I can only 100% activate this in Tiger Stance. I twice got the Turtle spirit to animate and dance with him in Turtle stance but can't reproduce those circumstances. Have not been able to recreate the Tiger animation glitch ( while in other stances) I read on the patch notes Braum's El Tigre skin recently had an audio fix. And I have noticed audio bugs regarding sion as well. Has anyone else reported any Sion issues with audio? If not I can make a seperate thread and report the bugs involving Sion.
